content.raw:
I did move closer and squatted to keep the console in the visual field. My score was something like .17. 

We've shared scores over in the Facebook group and nobody has experienced the problem you're seeing. You're welcome to join us at https://www.facebook.com/groups/autonomousrobot/ There are at least 18 of the teams that qualified there and a number of others.
